answers.answer: Are you having any symptoms of preeclampsia?  Headache,  blurred vision,  reduced urine output,  etc.?

i've had baaaad swelling! make sure you're tested for preeclampsia, but if that comes out  negative try eating melon. my doctor recommended it to me and most of the time it makes a difference. I cut a cantelope into bite size pieces for easy snacking throughout the day.

I havent been tested for pre eclampsia.. I told my doctor and showed her and she just said it's normal but again she doesn't spend more then 5 to 10 mins with me. I do have low iron but no gd. Just really stinks that it doesn't matter what I do they are literay swollen the moment I wake up. Wonder what the pre eclampsia test is? I will try melons :)

If you had preclampsia you would have been told. Its high blood pressure and your vitals are taken by the nurse before you even see the doctor.  Some people are just more probe to retaining water during pregnancy then others. Limit you sodium intake and that may help with it.

question: I'm almost 29 weeks and have been swelling so bad. I wake up with swollen feet and ankles and by the end of the day they are huge! The doc says it's normal and to put my feet up but nothing works. Anyone else having this problem.
title: swelling
